name: Verify fields displayed after clicking Apply button for "Department" -- @1.2

steps.name: Given I am on the Career landing page
When I click on the dropdown and select "HR department"
And I wait for the job listings to load
Then I click the Apply button for the "HR Manager" job
Then I should see a new page for filling job application details

fullName: Verify fields displayed after clicking the Apply button for HR Manager: Verify fields displayed after clicking Apply button for "Department"

labels.value: Verify fields displayed after clicking the Apply button for HR Manager
